How many people are affected by hereditary sensory and autonomic neuropathy type IE ?,HSAN IE is a rare disorder; its prevalence is unknown. Small numbers of affected families have been identified in populations around the world.,GHR,hereditary sensory and autonomic neuropathy type IE
